name: ForTrader widgets
author: Vekshin Vladimir

sections.description:
ForTrader widgets allows you to use ForTrader financial widgets on your wordpress website
The following widgets are currently available

  • The Bank of Russia Exchange Rates for Today and Tomorrow
  • Prices for precious metals and alloys
  • Raw Materials Price Index
  • Russian Stocks Index
  • Currency Rates On Foreign Exchange Market
  • Euro and US Dollar rates to Russian Ruble on the foreign exchange market
  • Cryptocurrency Prices
  • American Stock Prices
  • Global Stock Index
  • Converter/Currency Calculator of the Bank of Russia
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you are using WordPress 4.0 or later and that your server is running PHP 5.2.4 or later (same requirement as WordPress itself)
  2. Install and activate the plugin as usual from the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the FT widgets settings page and create at least one widget
  4. Now you can use created widget via WordPress Widgets (Ft Widget), short codes [ft_widget id=”1″] and use it in your php theme files “echo FtInformers::getInformer(1);”
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Make sure you are using WordPress 4.0 or later and that your server is running PHP 5.2.4 or later (same requirement as WordPress itself)
  2. Install and activate the plugin as usual from the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the FT widgets settings page and create at least one widget
  4. Now you can use created widget via WordPress Widgets (Ft Widget), short codes [ft_widget id=”1″] and use it in your php theme files “echo FtInformers::getInformer(1);”

Where to find help ?

  • First time users should visit ForTrader widgets – Faq, which explains the basics with a lot of screenshots.
